name: svm_scikit
desc: Divide datasets into classes to find a maximum marginal hyperplane.
label: SVM

x.label: Data points
x.desc: Data points (support vectors) to be divided into classes.

gamma.label: Gamma
gamma.desc: Gamma parameter of RBF controls the distance of the influence of a single training point.

C.label: C
C.desc: C regularization parameter used to set the tolerance of the model to allow the misclassification of data points in order to achieve lower generalization error. The C value controls the penalty of misclassification.
